text:
Tableau | Seattle & Palo Alto USA, Vancouver CAN | Onsite

http://www.tableau.com/

Our mission is to help people see & understand their data. I'm not good at marketing, you can Google us & read for yourself. I've been here >3 years and love it - common feeling here, the high retention rate and happy team speaks for itself. Happy customers, too. The customer conference is a lot of fun.

We're hiring pretty much every engineering specialty, still growing fast - my team specifically is looking for web client expertise, but if that's not your thing I can connect you with someone who knows your specialty better. Web client stack is the usual SPA ecosystem: Angular, React, Node, TypeScript. Happy to go deeper if you're interested. Reach me at jclement@tableau.com or koggit@gmail.com.
